mapper.sql: SELECT NB_ID, BBS_CATE, TTL, CN, WRTR, REG_DTM, STUS FROM notice
mapper.select: SELECT NB_ID, BBS_CATE, TTL, CN, WRTR, REG_DTM, STUS FROM NOTICE WHERE NB_ID = #{NB_ID}
SELECT NB_ID, BBS_CATE, TTL, CN, WRTR, REG_DTM, STUS FROM NOTICE ORDER BY REG_DTM DESC, NB_ID DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE BBS_CATE=#{BBS_CATE}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (BBS_CATE, STUS, TTL, CN, WRTR) VALUES (#{BBS_CATE}, #{STUS}, #{TTL}, #{CN}, #{WRTR})
mapper.select: order by REG_DTM DESC, NB_ID DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

choose.otherwise: AND (TTL LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR CN LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
